The SciPy repository and source distributions bundle a number of libraries that are compatibly licensed. We list these here.

Name: Numpydoc Files: doc/sphinxext/numpydoc/* License: 2-clause BSD

For details, see doc/sphinxext/LICENSE.txt

Name: scipy-sphinx-theme Files: doc/scipy-sphinx-theme/* License: 3-clause BSD, PSF and Apache 2.0

For details, see doc/sphinxext/LICENSE.txt

Name: Decorator Files: scipy/_lib/decorator.py License: 2-clause BSD

For details, see the header inside scipy/_lib/decorator.py

Name: ID Files: scipy/linalg/src/id_dist/* License: 3-clause BSD

For details, see scipy/linalg/src/id_dist/doc/doc.tex

Name: L-BFGS-B Files: scipy/optimize/lbfgsb/* License: BSD license

For details, see scipy/optimize/lbfgsb/README
